name: Domination
description: Teams compete to control strategic points across the map.

name: Convoy
description: Escort vehicles to their destination while defending against enemy attacks.

name: Convergence
description: Fight to control critical convergence points in dynamic battles.

name: Doom Match
description: High-intensity combat with rapid respawns and aggressive gameplay.

name: Conquest
description: Standard team deathmatch mode in which players compete for eliminations
